raw.html:
{{text1}}


{{p1}}


{{p2}}

fields.label: paragraph
fields.value: For the last twelve years I've been tutoring people from many different countries and cultures and of all ages in Egyptian Arabic. I'm a certified GPA (Growth Participator Approach) instructor, and over the years I've learned to adapt to my students' individual learning styles; some prefer using grammar books, others learn best with visual/audio learning, and a few have taken to more unorthodox methods.

fields.label: paragraph
fields.value: My goal is to guide you along on your Arabic journey in whichever way helps you learn and keeps you engaged. Learning a new language can seem like a scary or far-fetched goal, but try a lesson and you'll see it's a lot of fun and totally possible.

final.html:
مرحبا I am Emad


For the last twelve years I've been tutoring people from many different countries and cultures and of all ages in Egyptian Arabic. I'm a certified GPA (Growth Participator Approach) instructor, and over the years I've learned to adapt to my students' individual learning styles; some prefer using grammar books, others learn best with visual/audio learning, and a few have taken to more unorthodox methods.


My goal is to guide you along on your Arabic journey in whichever way helps you learn and keeps you engaged. Learning a new language can seem like a scary or far-fetched goal, but try a lesson and you'll see it's a lot of fun and totally possible.
